review: Nice device .. and with the new updates .. it is the best

review: Make sure you have very high speed internet....doesn't work worth a crap with my satellite internet service,
author: James M. Coleman "Colemanx4"

review: It takes so long to connect to the wifi.  Not worth the trouble.
author: Devin Harris

review: I can't live without my Chromecast! I'm in college and didn't want to spend a bunch of money on cable per month. Each of my roommates has a different subscription service (Netflix, HBO Go, Hulu, etc.) so we all share the accounts and cast them on the Chromecast. It's a good way to save money and watch all of your favorite shows. You just have to make sure you have dependable Wifi in order to cast the shows and movies successfully.
author: Riley Crawford

review: Fabulous product.  I love being able to "throw" programming from my computer to the TV.
author: Stuart C. Turgel
